reset.defaults.all.warning: AdGuard Mini will restart. Some features will need a new setup
disable.all.desc: All settings in this section will be disabled
tray.frequent.updates: Want more frequent auto updates? Buy the full version
tray.home.title.protection.enabled.desc: Surf safely — we've got your back
tray.home.title.protection.extensions.al: All Safari extensions are off. <link>Fix it</link>

support.faq.desc: Most questions are already answered here
support.report.desc: Tell us if you notice a missed ad or a broken website
support.contact.support.desc: Send bug reports, feature suggestions, and questions
support.discuss.desc: Share your thoughts about AdGuard Mini on social networks or GitHub
support.rate.desc: Let other people know what you think about AdGuard Mini
support.contact.improve.app: How can we improve the app?
support.contact.what.went.wrong: Please tell us what went wrong. When did the problem occur? Do you use a VPN or an antivirus?
support.contact.error.empty.email: Please enter your email address — we’ll keep you informed of our progress
support.contact.error.invalid.email: Please enter a valid email address
support.contact.add.logs: Add app logs, info about filters, and app version
support.contact.add.logs.desc: It’ll help us investigate your issue faster
support.contact.got.your.message.title: Got your message
support.contact.got.your.message.desc: Thank you! We’ll contact you if we need more details
support.contact.failed.submit.title: Failed to send message
support.contact.failed.submit.desc: Make sure you’re online and try again. If it doesn’t help, you can send the message to <link>support@adguard.com</link>
onboarding.start.title: Welcome on board
onboarding.start.desc: To be clear: we collect as little data as possible to run our websites and apps. We don’t share your data with anyone
onboarding.extensions.title: Enable AdGuard extensions
onboarding.extensions.desc:
AdGuard requires these extensions to block ads, trackers, and annoyances in Safari. You also need them to apply advanced blocking rules and to block ads manually. Select Always Allow on Every Website to ensure it works properly



We never share your data with anyone. Check out our Privacy policy
onboarding.ads.title: AdGuard is up and running
onboarding.ads.desc: AdGuard is already protecting you from ads. Leave everything as is, or fine-tune the app to your needs
onboarding.trackers.title: Block trackers?
onboarding.trackers.desc: Protect your personal information from trackers and keep your online activities private
onboarding.annoyances.title: Block annoyances?
onboarding.annoyances.desc: Remove cookie notifications, social widgets, live chats, newsletter sign-ups, and other annoying popups
onboarding.finish.title: You’re all set
onboarding.finish.desc: Enjoy using AdGuard Mini! If you skipped a step, you can fine-tune the app later
license.license.free.version.desc: Buy the full version to unlock all features

license.extend.your.license.notification: Use your license on other devices

license.notification.action.login.or.sig: Log in or create an account
safari.protection.title.desc: Blocks ads, trackers, and annoyances on websites opened in Safari
safari.protection.block.ads.desc: Blocks ads on websites opened in Safari
safari.protection.block.search.ads.desc: Blocks ads in search results and self-promotion of websites
safari.protection.block.language.desc: Blocks ads on websites in specified languages
safari.protection.block.trackers.desc: Protects your online activity and personal data from web trackers
safari.protection.block.social.desc: Blocks social media buttons such as Like and Share
safari.protection.block.cookie.desc: Blocks cookie consent forms on websites
safari.protection.block.popups.desc: Blocks annoying popups that are unnecessary for website functionality
safari.protection.block.widgets.desc: Blocks third-party widgets including online assistants and live support chats
language.specific.title: Language-specific ad blocking
language.specific.desc: Blocks ads on websites in specified languages
user.rules.editor.title: User rules editor
user.rules.desc: Your rules for blocking and unblocking ads or entire websites
user.rules.delete.all.desc: All user rules will be permanently deleted
Save the changes before closing the editor?
user.rules.import.modal.title: Import rules?
user.rules.import.modal.desc: This will replace your existing rules. The action can’t be undone
user.rule.exception.jsAndScriplets: Don’t apply JS and scriptlet rules
user.rule.block.domain.label: Block requests to this domain
user.rule.unblock.domain.label: Unblock requests to this domain
user.rule.block.content.label: Block this content
user.rule.unblock.content.label: Unblock this content
user.rule.apply.websites.label: Apply the rule to these websites
user.rule.leave.desc.edit: Your changes to the rule will be lost
user.rules.editor.plug.title: Editor opened in another window
user.rules.editor.plug.desc: Your rules will appear here after you close it
user.rules.editor.update_info.has_update:
User rules were updated through Assistant.

Apply the updates and discard your current changes?
user.rules.editor.update_info.saved: Rules saved. Safari may need some time to apply them
advanced.blocking.desc: Handles tricky cases when basic ad-blocking rules don't suffice
advanced.blocking.rules.desc: CSS rules, CSS selectors, and scriptlets that allow AdGuard to block complex ads like YouTube ads in Safari
advanced.blocking.extra.desc: A script that prevents websites from bypassing ad blockers and re-inserting blocked ads
advanced.blocking.extra.try: Available in the full version. <btn>Try for free</btn>
advanced.blocking.extra.pay: Available in the full version. <btn>Get full version</btn>
settings.launch.on.start: Launch AdGuard Mini at system startup
settings.show.in.menu: Show AdGuard Mini in the menu bar
settings.hardware.acceleration.desc: Speeds up CPU performance. To apply changes, restart the app
settings.update.filters.auto.desc: Regularly checks for and downloads filter updates
settings.real.time.filter.updates.desc: Updates filters as soon as there’s a new filtering rule, change, or fix
settings.real.time.filter.updates.enable: To use this setting, enable Update filters automatically
settings.filters.desc: Sets of rules to block ads, trackers, and annoyances
settings.safari.ext.desc: Mechanisms for implementing ad-blocking rules in Safari
settings.safari.ext.all.warning: All Safari extensions are off. <nav>Fix it</nav>
settings.debug.desc: Records detailed logs to help with troubleshooting. Turn it on to reproduce the problem, then send us the logs
settings.debug.warning: May use more battery — turn it off after exporting the logs
settings.export.desc: Saves a .zip file on your device
settings.adg.general.desc: Contains rules from the most essential filters for blocking ads
settings.adg.privacy.desc: Contains rules from filters for blocking trackers and web analytics
settings.adg.social.desc: Contains rules from filters against social media buttons, widgets, scripts, and icons
settings.adg.other.desc: Contains rules from other non-categorized filters
settings.adg.custom.desc: Contains rules from other non-categorized filters
settings.rule.limit.exceeded:
Rule limit exceeded. Rules over this limit are disabled.

Please
check your filters
and disable the ones you don't need
settings.converter.error: Something went wrong while compiling rules — reinstalling the app might help
settings.adg.for.safari.desc: Displays AdGuard’s icon in Safari settings that allows you to quickly manage protection. Also contains advanced ad-blocking rules
settings.filter.update.interval.free: Available in the full version. <link>Try for free</link>
settings.paywall.title: Power up your protection
settings.paywall.trial.expired.title: Your trial has expired
settings.paywall.license.expired.title: Your license has expired
settings.paywall.desc: Unlock advanced features to take your online privacy to the next level
settings.paywall.expired.desc: Get the full version to keep your online protection at the highest level
settings.paywall.terms.and.conditions.de:
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase.



Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.



Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.



You can manage and cancel your subscription by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.



AdGuard’s EULA and Privacy policy

restart.app.desc: This is required to enable hardware acceleration
restart.app.desc.import: This is required to apply new hardware acceleration settings
filters.filters.desc: Sets of rules to block ads, trackers, and annoyances

filters.more.filters.desc:
You can find more filters at

filterlists.com
filters.filter.name: Filter name
filters.trusted.filter.desc: Trusted filters can use powerful rule modifiers — be sure you use a filter from trusted developers
filters.remove.all.custom.filters.desc: This will remove your added filters. AdGuard will block ads and trackers using pre-installed filters and user rules
filters.language.specific.disabled: To activate this filter, enable <btn>Language-specific</btn> ad blocking
custom.filter.check.failed: No filters found. Check the link or use a different one

login.item.modal.title: Enable Login Items for AdGuard Mini
login.item.modal.desc: AdGuard Mini isn’t working properly. To fix this, enable AdGuard Mini in Login Items & Extensions → Allow in the Background
consent.modal.title: Please read carefully before enabling Annoyance filters
consent.modal.desc: You are about to enable one or more annoyance filters. They block elements that are either unrelated to website content or related but annoying to your user experience. Website owners may consider these elements mandatory: if you block them, you may be violating their terms; some functionality of websites may not be available or may not work properly. You understand and agree that you are solely responsible to comply with the terms of use of websites you visit and that AdGuard is not responsible for your compliance with the terms of use of websites you visit using our products.
consent.modal.migration.title: The policy of working with Annoyance filters has changed
consent.modal.migration.desc: Now, before enabling Annoyance filters, you must give your consent to enable them. These filters block elements that are either unrelated to website content or related but annoying and disruptive. Website owners may consider these elements mandatory: if you block them, you may be violating their terms. AdGuard is not responsible for your compliance with the terms of use of websites you visit using our products.
consent.modal.enable.filters: | Enable this filter? | Enable these filters?
consent.modal.enable.filter.policy: For details on what AdGuard’s annoyance filters block, see <link>Filter policy</link>. For third-party filters, visit their homepages
tray.story.adguard.extensions.desc: AdGuard requires these extensions to block ads, trackers, and annoyances in Safari
tray.story.login.item.desc: AdGuard Mini isn’t working properly. To fix this, enable AdGuard Mini in Login Items → Allow in the Background
tray.story.meetAGMini.card.title: Meet AdGuard Mini
tray.story.meetAGMini.card.desc: It’s the same trusted Safari extension — now redesigned and faster, with optional Pro capabilities
tray.story.advanced.features.desc: Unlock the features that will take your protection level to 100%: advanced blocking, protection for all platforms and many more
tray.story.advanced.features.action.tria: | Try %trialDays% day for free | Try %trialDays% days for free
tray.story.other.devices: Use your license on other devices
tray.story.other.devices.desc: Bind this license to your AdGuard account to protect your computer, tablet, or smartphone
tray.story.filters.desc.1: Filters are groups of filtering rules — lines of code that tell AdGuard what to block
tray.story.filters.desc.2: Filters group rules by task, like blocking trackers or social media buttons. Some filters block content in a specific language
tray.story.filters.desc.3: Many people are involved in creating filters: filter developers, enthusiasts, and even regular users
tray.story.filters.desc.4: If you notice a missed ad, click Report incorrect blocking — that’s a huge help!
tray.story.filters.desc.5: We’re explaining how filters work in our blog
tray.story.rate.adguard: What do you think about AdGuard?
tray.story.rate.adguard.trustpilot.title: Could you rate us on Trustpilot?
tray.story.rate.adguard.appstore.title: Could you rate us on the App Store?
tray.story.rate.adguard.rate.desc: Your feedback can help others learn more about AdGuard
tray.story.rate.adguard.problem.title: Tell us what went wrong
tray.story.rate.adguard.problem.desc: Is there anything we can fix? Please let us know
tray.story.adguard.extra.desc: AdGuard Extra is our userscript that blocks complex ads, mostly on social media and TV websites
tray.story.adguard.extra.desc.2: AdGuard Extra prevents websites from bypassing ad blockers and re-inserting blocked ads
tray.story.adguard.extra.title.3: Try AdGuard Extra in the full version
tray.story.adguard.extra.desc.3: Try the full version to enhance your protection with AdGuard Extra
tray.story.adguard.extra.desc.4: The paid version allows you to enhance your protection with AdGuard Extra
tray.story.adguard.extra.action.3.trial: | Try %trialDays% day for free | Try %trialDays% days for free
context.menu.report.problem.tooltip:
Something not working right?

Let us know
telemetry.modal.title: App usage data
telemetry.modal.text.2: Names of screens you interact with
telemetry.modal.text.5: This data is anonymous and only used internally to analyze and improve the functionality of AdGuard
telemetry.modal.text.6: We don’t track users and don’t use third-party SDKs for advertising or analytics
telemetry.modal.text.7: You can always disable data sharing in Settings
telemetry.modal.text.8: For more information, see our Privacy policy
telemetry.story.title: Let’s make AdGuard better together
telemetry.story.frame.1.title: Let’s make AdGuard better together
telemetry.story.frame.1.desc: We study how people use the app — what works well and what needs improvement
telemetry.story.frame.2.title: Your data stays anonymous
telemetry.story.frame.2.desc: We won’t know what exactly you do in the app — only which features and screens are most popular in general. <link>Privacy policy</link>
telemetry.story.frame.3.title: You can enable data sharing anytime
telemetry.story.frame.3.desc: Just open Settings and toggle the switch. We’ll be grateful for your help improving AdGuard
telemetry.story.frame.4.title: Your help means a lot
telemetry.story.frame.4.desc:
Thank you! Our team will use this data to make AdGuard work even better for you

You can change your choice anytime in Settings
migration.step.1.title: Meet AdGuard Mini
migration.step.1.description.1: It’s the same trusted Safari extension — now redesigned, faster, and still free
migration.step.1.description.2: It also got Pro capabilities: real-time filter updates and AdGuard Extra. Filters update as soon as there’s a change. AdGuard Extra blocks complex ads on news and TV websites
migration.step.2.title: Have a license?
migration.step.2.description.1: Use your active AdGuard license to unlock Pro capabilities in AdGuard Mini
migration.step.2.description.2: The only exception is AdGuard for iOS. AdGuard Mini doesn’t support its license
